alert.note: Alert for Halifax; Pittsylvania (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Charlotte, southeastern Campbell, northeastern Pittsylvania and northwestern Halifax Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 712 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Aspen, or near Phenix, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brookneal... Mt Airy... Nathalie... Cody... Leda... Hat Creek... and Wren. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
